en: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are going out for the evening.
zh: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸今晚外出。

en: Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig are going to baby-sit.
zh: 猪奶奶和猪爷爷来照料孩子。

en: Peppa, George. Into your beds! Quick!
Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are leaving for their evening out.
zh: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸离开家了。

en: Peppa and George are so good.
zh: 佩奇和乔治表现得很好。

en: They just fell asleep when Mummy Pig told them to!
zh: 猪妈妈一说他们就去睡觉了！

en: I wonder if we should check upstairs...
zh: 我想我们是不是该上楼看一下。。。
好吧，我从来没有见过这么快睡着的。

en: So, it wasn't Peppa and George making all that noise.
zh: 所以，刚才的声音不是佩奇和乔治发出来的哦。

en: I think they really have fallen asleep.
Gardening. Today we are talking about ''Roses''.
zh: 园艺。今天我们来谈谈玫瑰花。

en: The Gavesgate is a particularly thorny rose.
To prune it, start by lopping off the head
zh: 修剪它时，先剪掉它的头

en: and then snip away the budding shoots.
You should be in bed asleep!
zh: 你们俩不是应该睡着了吗！

en: George and I are not sleepy at all.
Can we watch TV with you?
zh: 我们可以和你们一起看电视吗？

en: Well... I suppose watching a little TV might make you sleepy.
zh: 好吧。。。我想看一会电视你们就会困的。

en: Icelandic Roses are a rare treat for the discerning horticulturist.
zh: 冰岛玫瑰对于园艺爱好者来说是非常稀有的品种

en: But they are prone to lobbing in temperate habitats.
zh: 但是温暖的环境不利它们生长。

en: Grandpa Pig? Can you play that game
zh: 爷爷？你能和我们玩游戏吗？

en: where you throw us up and catch us?
zh: 把我们抛到空中又接住的游戏

en: Okay, but just one turn each!
zh: 好的，但是一次只能一个人！

en: Phew... You seem heavier than before.
zh: 哎哟。。。你好像比以前重了。

en: Maybe Grandpa Pig is a bit tired.
I know! Granny Pig, let's play catch!
zh: 我知道！奶奶，我们来玩捉人游戏吧！

en: You're ''It''! Catch us if you can!
zh: 你是捉人的那个！来捉我们呀！

en: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are back home.
zh: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸回家了。

en: I hope our little piggies are asleep.
zh: 希望我们的小猪们都睡着了。

en: And so are the big piggies!
